image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Utah; born in West Bountiful, Davis County, Utah, December 5, 1974; graduated from Viewmont High School, Bountiful, Utah, 1993; B.A., University of Utah, Salt Lake City, Utah, 2000; J.D., Columbia University, New York, N.Y., 2003; lawyer; adjunct professor; staff, Mayor of Salt Lake City, 2008-2012; member of the Utah state senate, 2008-2012; Mayor of Salt Lake County, 2013-2019; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-January 3, 2021); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress in 2020.
